speaker: Agent
text: Hi there, this is Mike from XYZ Collections. How the hell are you?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing well, thank you for asking. How can I help you today?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m calling about your past due balance. Can you just confirm your name?

speaker: Agent
text: Great! You've got an outstanding balance of $500. When are you gonna pay this shit off?

speaker: Customer
text: I understand the seriousness. I’m currently assessing my finances.

speaker: Agent
text: Assessing your finances? Whatever! Just get your act together and pay us!

speaker: Customer
text: I appreciate your concern, but I need some time to sort this out.

speaker: Agent
text: Time? You think we have time to waste? Get real! This is unacceptable!

speaker: Customer
text: I assure you, I'm doing my best to resolve this issue.

speaker: Agent
text: Your best isn’t good enough! Do you think I care about your excuses?

speaker: Customer
text: I would just like to find a solution that works for both of us.

speaker: Agent
text: Solution? You need to get your head out of your ass and just pay!

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you for your time. I will reach out once I have a plan.

speaker: Agent
text: Yeah, whatever. Just don't take too long, dumbass.
